authentication.name: authentication
authentication.description: Means of authenticating with the service
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

path.name: path
path.description: The path of which to list the content
path.ai_hint: The path of which to list the content

toPath.name: toPath
toPath.description: The new path of file or folder
toPath.ai_hint: The new path of file or folder

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file to upload
fileContent.ai_hint: The text content of the file to upload

query.name: query
query.description: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments.
query.ai_hint: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments.

fileStatus.name: fileStatus
fileStatus.description: The string to search for. May match across multiple fields based on the request arguments.
fileStatus.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

filters.name: filters

options.name: include_deleted
options.description: Whether the results will include entries for files and folders that used to exist but were deleted. The default for this field is False.

options.name: include_has_explicit_shared_members
options.description: Whether the results will include a flag for each file indicating whether or not that file has any explicit members. The default for this field is False.

options.name: include_mounted_folders
options.description: Whether the results will include entries under mounted folders which includes app folder, shared folder and team folder. The default for this field is True.

options.name: include_non_downloadable_files
options.description: Whether to include files that are not downloadable, i.e. Google Docs. The default for this field is True.

options.name: recursive
options.description: Whether the list folder operation will be applied recursively to all subfolders and the response will contain contents of all subfolders. The default for this field is False.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'toPath'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'move' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'move' AND resource IN ["file", "folder"] THEN SHOW parameter 'toPath'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryData'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' AND binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'fileContent'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' AND binaryData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'query' AND resource == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'query' AND resource == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileStatus'
IF operation == 'query' AND resource == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'query' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'query' AND resource == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'search' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'list' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF operation == 'list' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'list' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
